answers.answer: Hi there,I know it must be tough to see your wife going through a rough patch.  My best advice is to follow her doctor's advice and stay on insulin.  You should try your best to help her quit smoking immediately.  Diabetes can affect systemically, worsening her pneumonia and pulmonary edema.  I strongly encourage you to help her maintain an appropriate diet (consult with a diabetic dietician specialist), exercise, and medical regiment.  Since she has pneumonia and pulmonary edema, it's also important to monitor her fluid intake.  Having sugar so high she will most likely feel thirsty most of the time.  Consult with the doctor to see how much water is safe for her to consume.  Best of luck to you and her.
